briefdescription.para: This function is called by the application when a message that requires processing by the ESL Server is received.

inbodydescription.para: TODO: Process PAWR messages here, or add a handler specific to PAWR messages TODO: Process state machine events here, when connection is closed, etc. TODO: Initiate advertising according to state machine in spec, in ESL this will be done by the ESL Profile layer, not the application layer

memberdef.argsstring: (dmConnId_t connId, uint16_t handle, uint8_t operation, uint16_t offset, uint16_t len, uint8_t *pValue, attsAttr_t *pAttr)
memberdef.name: EslsWriteCback

briefdescription.para: ATTS write callback for glucose service record access control point. Use this function as a parameter to SvcEslCbackRegister().

detaileddescription.para:
connId
DM connection identifier.
handle
ATT handle.
operation
ATT operation.
offset
Write offset.
len
Write length.
pValue
Value to write.
pAttr
Attribute to write.
ATT status.
ATTS write callback for glucose service record access control point. Use this function as a parameter to SvcEslCbackRegister().

memberdef.argsstring: (dmConnId_t connId, uint16_t handle, uint8_t operation, uint16_t offset, attsAttr_t *pAttr)
memberdef.name: EslsReadCback

briefdescription.para: ATTS read callback for ESL Server. Use this function as a parameter to SvcEslCbackRegister().
Set the supported features of the ESL Server.
Set the CCCD handle list index used by the application for ESL service characteristics.

parameterdescription.para: ESL control point CCCD handle index.

briefdescription.para: Encode the display information from a given display information struct to a buffer then set the attribute value.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the display information structure.

briefdescription.para: Encode the sensor information from a given sensor information struct to a buffer then set the attribute value.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the sensor information structure.

briefdescription.para: Encode the LED information from a given led information struct to a buffer then set the attribute value.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the LED information structure.

briefdescription.para: Set configuration for an LED in the ESL.
